quest_tutorial_1: Walk into something to interact with it, or press Enter (â†²) if you're above it.
quest_tutorial_2: Press Slash (/) to view the main menu. Try it again to return!
quest_tutorial_3: Use Plus (+) to zoom in, or use Minus (-) to zoom out.
quest_tutorial_4: Press Four (4) to open your inventory. Period (.) drops, and Enter activates!
quest_tutorial_5: Try holding Zero (0) to enter combos. Nine (9) can be used to view details.
